title: HAP 54 - Wilson Moses on the Roots of Black Nationalism
itunes:title: HAP 54 - Wilson Moses on the Roots of Black Nationalism
description: Wilson Moses speaks to us about his research into early black notionalism, as represented by Crummell, Douglass, and others.
